articles.description: Viewers tuning in to Thursday's episode of 40-year-old Biel's series Candy were surprised to see the face of her 41-year-old husband as he made a surprise appearance.
articles.content:
They have been married for a decade and share two children together.
But one thing Justin Timberlake and Jessica Biel haven't shared together is the screen... until now.

articles.title: Watch: Rebel Wilson Does Her Best Britney Spears In New 'Senior Year' Clip - We Got This Covered
